issue.title: [R] write_parquet()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5509](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5509). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We can read but not yet write. The C++ library supports this and pyarrow does it.
